title: VR Q2 Firefighter Simulator
tagline: High-fidelity training environment for the Meta Quest 2.
shortDescription: A VR training simulation for firefighters, built for the Meta Quest 2. This project provides a realistic environment to practice emergency procedures and equipment handling.
features: Realistic Fire Simulation: Dynamic fire and smoke effects for an immersive training experience.
Interactive Equipment: Users can operate hoses, extinguishers, and other firefighting tools.
Scenario-Based Training: Multiple training modules covering different emergency situations.
